'''{{PAGENAME}}''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
The quaint home of one "Thelys", who is otherwise nowhere to be found.

==Points of interest==
* Not much to see here besides a couple of loot containers.
